00029 #ifndef ABSTRACTDYNAMICALLYLOADABLEENTITY_HPP_
00030 #define ABSTRACTDYNAMICALLYLOADABLEENTITY_HPP_
00031 
00032 #include "DynamicCellModelLoader.hpp"
00033 #include "DynamicModelLoaderRegistry.hpp"
00034 #include "ChasteSerialization.hpp"
00035 #include <boost/serialization/split_member.hpp>
00036 
00041 class AbstractDynamicallyLoadableEntity
00042 {
00043 private:
00044 
00046     DynamicCellModelLoader* mpLoader;
00047     
00048     friend class boost::serialization::access;
00055     template<class Archive>
00056     void save(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version) const
00057     {
00058         const std::string so_path = GetLoader()->GetLoadableModulePath();
00059         archive & so_path;
00060     }
00067     template<class Archive>
00068     void load(Archive & archive, const unsigned int version)
00069     {
00070         std::string so_path;
00071         archive & so_path;
00072         SetLoader(DynamicModelLoaderRegistry::Instance()->GetLoader(so_path));
00073     }
00074     BOOST_SERIALIZATION_SPLIT_MEMBER()
00075 
00076 public:
00078     virtual ~AbstractDynamicallyLoadableEntity();
00079 
00083     const DynamicCellModelLoader* GetLoader() const;
00084 
00090     void SetLoader(DynamicCellModelLoader* pLoader);
00091 };
00092 
00093 #endif /*ABSTRACTDYNAMICALLYLOADABLEENTITY_HPP_*/
